2024 DIGIxTCAx平權聯合成果展 - 全球數位新星大賞｜Global Digital Talent Awards

「跨域數位人才加速躍升計畫」不僅是一個培訓計畫，更是一場業界研究與實踐的洗禮。
除了聯合了7間法人單位和27家企業，更鎖定5大領域：人工智慧、智慧聯網、資料科學、智慧內容和數位行銷，培育台灣學生和國際學生，完成實務專題並發表。
此外，也和海外的單位合作培育台灣學生，並分享成果。
 「DIGI+ x TCA全球數位新星大賞」成果發表將展示年輕世代跨領域的實戰能力，並也提供培訓單位研發成果或服務展示的機會。
誠摯邀請你們來參加，一起見證我們在人才培育和產業數位發展上的成就，深入了解數位未來。現在就馬上報名吧！🚀

📅 活動日期：11/26(二)~11/27(三)
🏢 活動地點：台北文創6樓多功能廳 (台北市信義區菸廠路88號6樓) 
報名網址：https://ievents.iii.org.tw/EventS.aspx?t=0&id=2681
窗口：DIGI+計畫辦公室，連絡電話：0800-035822轉1，Email：digitalent@itri.org.tw。
活動亮點包括：
✅ 18國研習生跨國合作 | 來自18國的研習生與台灣學生共同合作！
✅ 5大數位經濟領域專題 | 涵蓋AI、資料科學、物聯網、數位內容和網路行銷，專業成果豐碩！
✅ 39個專題發表競賽 | 34家實務研習單位精選專題，點燃創新的火花！
✅ 39攤位成果展示 | 親自體驗交流，深入瞭解團隊成果！
除了可以參與現場專題投票，行動支持喜歡的專題🌟
還能參加闖關遊戲，有機會獲得限量禮品！ 😍
無論你是對數位領域有濃厚興趣，還是純粹想度過充實的兩天，這個成果展都值得你參加！一同來參與這場數位盛宴，探索未來的可能性，並與我們共同創造更美好的數位世界吧！ 🌐

🔥 2024 DIGI+ X TCA Global Digital Talent Awards

The Administration for Digital Industries is dedicated to nurturing the digital talents of tomorrow, and we're eager to connect with a global audience! 
"DIGI+ Talent Accelerator and Jumpstart Program" is not just a training program, it also incorporates industry research and hands-on practical experience. We've united 7 legal entities and 27 corporate partners and focused on 5 key areas: Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Smart Network, Smart Content, and Digital Marketing. Our goal is to cultivate a total of 161 Taiwanese students and 49 international students from 18 countries. Moreover, we partnered with foreign institutions to offer training to 18 Taiwanese students and subsequently shared the results as part of the international internship program for Taiwanese talents.
Now, we present to you the 2024 “DIGI+ x TCA Global Digital Talent Awards,” an event showcasing our trainees’ exceptional final presentations, and the event will include activities such as booth exhibition of final projects, project presentation competition, and commendation ceremony for outstanding Training Institutions, and the Awards Ceremony. We excitedly invite everyone interested in interdisciplinary studies or talent cultivation to come join us!🤩 

⏰Time: Nov 26 (Tue.) ~ Nov 27 (Wed.) 

🏬Venue: 6F Function Room,“Taipei New Horizon” (6F., No. 88, Yanchang Rd., Xinyi Dist., Taipei City) 

APPLY https://ievents.iii.org.tw/EventS.aspx?t=0&id=2681

⭐️Event Highlights:
✅ Collaborative International Projects | Trainees from 18 different countries working hand-in-hand to create marvelous projects together! 
✅ 5 Interdisciplinary Project Topics | Final projects span the fields of Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Smart Networks, Digital Content, and Digital Marketing
✅ 39 Groups of Final Project Presentation | From 38 Training Institutions presenting creative and innovative ideas, sparking innovation with their applications
✅ 39 Interactive Booths & Presentations | Join us in person to visit all the booths, and talk to each team to get to know about the projects!

Come and vote for your favorite projects! You can also win exclusive gifts by playing games at the event! 😍
